summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the period from November 8, 2013, to November 30, 2013. It details various transactions including deposits, withdrawals, and fees, highlighting significant financial activities during that time.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirb
persons.context: Amanda Kirb is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: M. Rites S. McCorquodale
persons.context: M. Rites S. McCorquodale is mentioned as a recipient of an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein transferred funds to M. Rites S. McCorquodale's account as part of a financial transaction.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $100,000 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $30,826.08 was credited to Epstein's account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, VI 00802
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's Deutsche Bank account.
The account had a beginning balance of $42,953,758 and an ending balance of $585,548.77 as of November 30, 2013.
Significant transactions included a $100,000 transfer to M. Rites S. McCorquodale and various preauthorized debits.
Amanda Kirb is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made to INTELLCK CON ED OF NY during the statement period.
